Package DatabaseAccess

Class UserQuery

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAccess.UserQuery
public class UserQuery extends Object
This class controls all queries to the database related to Users.

    static boolean
    logIn(String uName, String password)
    Checks the supplied username and password against users in the database.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<User>
    selectAllToList()
    Queries the database for all Users and returns them as User Objects in an ObservableList.
    static User
    selectUser(String userName)
    Queries the database and returns a user object of any user that matches the supplied username parameter.

    • UserQuery

      public UserQuery()

  • Method Details

    • logIn

      public static boolean logIn(String uName, String password)
      Checks the supplied username and password against users in the database.
      Parameters:
      uName - string username compared to users in the database.
      password - string password compared to passwords attached to users in the database.
      Returns:
      true if both strings match, false otherwise.

    • selectUser

      public static User selectUser(String userName)
      Queries the database and returns a user object of any user that matches the supplied username parameter.
      Parameters:
      userName - string username of user to search for.
      Returns:
      User object matching the supplied userName.

    • selectAllToList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> selectAllToList()
      Queries the database for all Users and returns them as User Objects in an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      Observable list of all Users in the database.
